[[inst_ctz]]
==== CTZ

*Syntax:* ctz SrcL,  M, N, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Count Trailing Zeros: counts the number of trailing zero bits.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_ctz.svg[CTZ encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU
